title: ExecuteMsg
description: This structure describes the execute messages available in the contract.

oneOf.description: Vote allows a vAMP holder to cast votes on which validators should get the delegations
Updates the vote for a specified user. Only can be called from the escrow_addr

quorum_bps.description: ChangeValidatorsLimit changes the max amount of validators that can be voted at once to receive delegations

use_weighted_vote.description: Updates if weighted voting is used

oneOf.description: ProposeNewOwner proposes a new owner for the contract

expires_in.description: The timestamp when the contract ownership change expires

oneOf.description: DropOwnershipProposal removes the latest contract ownership transfer proposal
ClaimOwnership allows the newly proposed owner to claim contract ownership

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

LockInfoResponse.description: This structure is used to return the lock information for a vAMP position.

amount.description: The amount of ampLP locked in the position

coefficient.description: This is the initial boost for the lock position

end.description: End time for the vAMP position decay

slope.description: Slope at which a staker's vAMP balance decreases over time

start.description: Start time for the vAMP position decay

voting_power.description: includes only decreasing voting_power, it is the current voting power of the period currently queried.
